task.en: I would like my computer to automatically start the Screen Saver after three hours being inactive. Please help me do so.
task.zh: 我想让电脑在三小时不活跃后启动屏保。请帮我做。
task.ar: أود أن يقوم جهازي بتشغيل شاشة التوقف تلقائيًا بعد ثلاث ساعات من عدم النشاط. من فضلك ساعدني في تحقيق ذلك.
task.ja: コンピュータが3時間無操作状態の場合、自動的にスクリーンセーバーを開始するように設定してください。
task.ru: Настройте компьютер так, чтобы он автоматически запускал экранную заставку после трех часов бездействия.

pre_command: osascript -e 'tell app "System Settings" to quit' && defaults -currentHost write com.apple.screensaver idleTime -int 0
grading_command: defaults -currentHost read com.apple.screensaver idleTime 2>/dev/null | grep -q "^10800$" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Lock Screen" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "锁定屏幕" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "قفل الشاشة" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "ロック画面" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Экран блокировки" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "System Settings" && echo "True" || echo "False"
